title: France panorama. [No. 72/15]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: European Championships - European indoor track and field championships. Film Festival - the Grenoble International Short Film Festival. A Century of Poster-Art - the National Library Exhibition. Power-Laser - the new carbonic gas laser. 2. The National Furniture Works - the Creation and Restoration departments at the Gobelins Tapestry Works. 3. The Paris Opera - new productions.
